faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.whatIsThisAnswer1: Tierlist allows you to create structured tierlists where items can be ranked across multiple dimensions:
faq.templatesDesc: Create reusable tierlist templates with custom tiers (rows), categories (columns), and cards (items)
faq.rankingsDesc: Fill out templates by dragging cards into cells to create your personal ranking
faq.sharingDesc: Share your rankings with view-only or editable links, allowing others to see or collaborate on rankings
faq.howToUse: How do I use this site?
faq.step1Desc: Start by creating a new template with your desired tiers, columns, and cards
faq.step2Desc: Click "Start Ranking" on any template to create your personal ranking
faq.step3Desc: Drag cards from the unranked area into the grid cells to rank them
faq.step4Desc: Use the Share button to get links for others to view or edit your ranking
